00027 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 // Function: VLNVEditor()
00029 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 VLNVEditor::VLNVEditor(VLNV::IPXactType type, LibraryInterface* libHandler, QWidget* parentWnd,
00031                                            QWidget* parent, bool compact) : 
00032 QGroupBox(parent), m_type(type), handler_(libHandler),
00033 m_vendorEdit(0), m_vendorMatcher(),
00034 m_libraryEdit(0), m_libraryMatcher(),
00035 m_nameEdit(0), m_nameMatcher(),
00036 m_versionEdit(0), m_versionMatcher()
00037 {
00038     Q_ASSERT(libHandler != 0);
00039     Q_ASSERT(m_type != VLNV::INVALID);
00040 
00041     // Set group box settings.
00042     setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Fixed);
00043     setTitle(tr("VLNV"));
00044 
00045     // Initialize the widgets and the connections between widgets.
00046     initWidgets(parentWnd, compact);
00047     initConnections();
00048 
00049         // accept drops from drag & drop
00050         setAcceptDrops(true);
00051 }

00060 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 // Function: setVLNV()
00062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void VLNVEditor::setVLNV(VLNV const* vlnv)
00064 {
00065     // Set the fields according to the VLNV.
00066     m_vendorEdit->setText(vlnv->getVendor());
00067     m_libraryEdit->setText(vlnv->getLibrary());
00068     m_nameEdit->setText(vlnv->getName());
00069     m_versionEdit->setText(vlnv->getVersion());
00070 
00071     // Update the matcher items.
00072     updateLibraryMatcherItem();
00073 }
00074 
00075 void VLNVEditor::setVLNV( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00076         setVLNV(&vlnv);
00077 }

00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 // Function: getVLNV()
00081 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 VLNV VLNVEditor::getVLNV() const
00083 {
00084     return VLNV(m_type, m_vendorEdit->text(), m_libraryEdit->text(),
00085                 m_nameEdit->text(), m_versionEdit->text());
00086 }

00088 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 // Function: isValid()
00090 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 bool VLNVEditor::isValid() const
00092 {
00093     return (!m_vendorEdit->text().isEmpty() && !m_libraryEdit->text().isEmpty() &&
00094             !m_nameEdit->text().isEmpty() && !m_versionEdit->text().isEmpty());
00095 }

00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Function: updateMatcherItems()
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 void VLNVEditor::updateMatcherItems()
00101 {
00102     m_vendorMatcher->setLibraryItem(getTypeRoot());
00103     updateLibraryMatcherItem();
00104 }
00105 
00106 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 // Function: updateLibraryMatcherItem()
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 void VLNVEditor::updateLibraryMatcherItem()
00110 {
00111     LibraryItem const* foundItem = 0;
00112     LibraryItem const* typeRoot = m_vendorMatcher->getLibraryItem();
00113   
00114     if (typeRoot != 0)
00115     {
00116         for (int i = 0; i < typeRoot->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00117         {
00118             LibraryItem const* child = typeRoot->child(i);
00119 
00120             if (child->getName() == m_vendorEdit->text())
00121             {
00122                 foundItem = child;
00123                 break;
00124             }
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     m_libraryMatcher->setLibraryItem(foundItem);
00129 
00130     // Update "recursively" also the name matcher item.
00131     updateNameMatcherItem();
00132 }
00133 
00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 // Function: updateNameMatcherItem()
00136 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 void VLNVEditor::updateNameMatcherItem()
00138 {
00139     LibraryItem const* libItem = m_libraryMatcher->getLibraryItem();
00140     LibraryItem const* foundItem = 0;
00141 
00142     if (libItem != 0)
00143     {
00144         for (int i = 0; i < libItem->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00145         {
00146             LibraryItem const* child = libItem->child(i);
00147 
00148             if (child->getName() == m_libraryEdit->text())
00149             {
00150                 foundItem = child;
00151                 break;
00152             }
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     m_nameMatcher->setLibraryItem(foundItem);
00157 
00158     // Update "recursively" also the version matcher item.
00159     updateVersionMatcherItem();
00160 }
00161 
00162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 // Function: updateVersionMatcherItem()
00164 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 void VLNVEditor::updateVersionMatcherItem()
00166 {
00167     LibraryItem const* nameItem = m_nameMatcher->getLibraryItem();
00168     LibraryItem const* foundItem = 0;
00169 
00170     if (nameItem != 0)
00171     {
00172         for (int i = 0; i < nameItem->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00173         {
00174             LibraryItem const* child = nameItem->child(i);
00175 
00176             if (child->getName() == m_nameEdit->text())
00177             {
00178                 foundItem = child;
00179                 break;
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 
00184     m_versionMatcher->setLibraryItem(foundItem);
00185 }

00187 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00188 // Function: initWidgets()
00189 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 void VLNVEditor::initWidgets(QWidget* parentWnd, bool compact)
00191 {
00192     // Create the labels.
00193     QLabel* vendorLabel = new QLabel(tr("Vendor:"), this);
00194     QLabel* libraryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Library:"), this);
00195     QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00196     QLabel* versionLabel = new QLabel(tr("Version:"), this);
00197 
00198     // Create the matchers.
00199     m_vendorMatcher = QSharedPointer<VLNVContentMatcher>(new VLNVContentMatcher(0));
00200     m_libraryMatcher = QSharedPointer<VLNVContentMatcher>(new VLNVContentMatcher(0));
00201     m_nameMatcher = QSharedPointer<VLNVContentMatcher>(new VLNVContentMatcher(0));
00202     m_versionMatcher = QSharedPointer<VLNVContentMatcher>(new VLNVContentMatcher(0));
00203     
00204     // Create the line edits.
00205     m_vendorEdit = new AssistedLineEdit(m_vendorMatcher, parentWnd, this);
00206     m_vendorEdit->setValidator(new NameValidator(this));
00207         m_vendorEdit->setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00208 
00209     m_libraryEdit = new AssistedLineEdit(m_libraryMatcher, parentWnd, this);
00210     m_libraryEdit->setValidator(new NameValidator(this));
00211         m_libraryEdit->setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00212 
00213     m_nameEdit = new AssistedLineEdit(m_nameMatcher, parentWnd, this);
00214         m_nameEdit->setValidator(new NameValidator(this, true));
00215         m_nameEdit->setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00216 
00217     m_versionEdit = new AssistedLineEdit(m_versionMatcher, parentWnd, this);
00218         m_versionEdit->setValidator(new NameValidator(this, true));
00219         m_versionEdit->setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00220     
00221     // Create the layout and add the widgets to it.
00222     if (compact)
00223     {
00224         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00225         layout->addWidget(vendorLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00226         layout->addWidget(m_vendorEdit, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00227         layout->addWidget(libraryLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00228         layout->addWidget(m_libraryEdit, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00229         layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00230         layout->addWidget(m_nameEdit, 2, 1, 1, 1);
00231         layout->addWidget(versionLabel, 3, 0, 1, 1);
00232         layout->addWidget(m_versionEdit, 3, 1, 1, 1);
00233     }
00234     else
00235     {
00236         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00237         layout->addWidget(vendorLabel);
00238         layout->addWidget(m_vendorEdit);
00239         layout->addWidget(libraryLabel);
00240         layout->addWidget(m_libraryEdit);
00241         layout->addWidget(nameLabel);
00242         layout->addWidget(m_nameEdit);
00243         layout->addWidget(versionLabel);
00244         layout->addWidget(m_versionEdit);
00245     }
00246 }

00248 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00249 // Function: initConnections()
00250 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00251 void VLNVEditor::initConnections()
00252 {
00253     // Connect the signals informing of changes in items.
00254     connect(m_vendorEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00255         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00256     connect(m_libraryEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00257         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00258     connect(m_nameEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00259         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00260     connect(m_versionEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00261         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00262 
00263     // Connect the signals informing the editing of items.
00264     connect(m_vendorEdit, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00265         this, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00266     connect(m_libraryEdit, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00267         this, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00268     connect(m_nameEdit, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00269         this, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00270     connect(m_versionEdit, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00271         this, SIGNAL(vlnvEdited()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00272 
00273     // Connect the matcher update slots to the textChanged signals.
00274     connect(m_vendorEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00275         this, SLOT(updateMatcherItems()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00276     connect(m_vendorEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00277         this, SLOT(updateLibraryMatcherItem()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00278     connect(m_libraryEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00279         this, SLOT(updateNameMatcherItem()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00280     connect(m_nameEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00281         this, SLOT(updateVersionMatcherItem()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00282 
00283     connect(static_cast<LibraryHandler*>(handler_), SIGNAL(refreshDialer()),
00284             this, SLOT(updateMatcherItems()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00285 }

00287 bool VLNVEditor::isEmpty() const {
00288         return (m_vendorEdit->text().isEmpty() && m_libraryEdit->text().isEmpty() &&
00289                 m_nameEdit->text().isEmpty() && m_versionEdit->text().isEmpty());
00290 }

00308 void VLNVEditor::dropEvent( QDropEvent* event ) {
00309         // Retrieve the vlnv.
00310         VLNV *vlnv;
00311         memcpy(&vlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(vlnv));
00312         setVLNV(vlnv);
00313         event->acceptProposedAction();
00314 
00315     emit vlnvEdited();
00316 }
00317 
00318 void VLNVEditor::dragEnterEvent( QDragEnterEvent* event ) {
00319         if (event->mimeData()->hasFormat("data/vlnvptr")) {
00320                 
00321                 // Retrieve the vlnv.
00322                 VLNV *vlnv;
00323                 memcpy(&vlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(vlnv));
00324 
00325                 // if the vlnv is of correct type
00326                 if (handler_->getDocumentType(*vlnv) == m_type)
00327                         event->acceptProposedAction();
00328         }
00329 }
00330 
00331 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00332 // Function: getTypeRoot()
00333 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00334 LibraryItem const* VLNVEditor::getTypeRoot() const
00335 {
00336     LibraryItem const* root = handler_->getTreeRoot();
00337 
00338     for (int i = 0; i < root->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00339     {
00340         if (root->child(i)->getName() == VLNV::type2Print(m_type))
00341         {
00342             return root->child(i);
00343         }
00344     }
00345 
00346     return 0;
00347 }
